text: Mickey 17 is a 2025 American South Korean science fiction comedy movie directed by Bong Joon-ho and was based on the 2022 novel Mickey7 by Edward Ashton. ==Cast== It stars Robert Pattinson, Naomi Ackie, Mark Ruffalo, Toni Collette, Steven Yeun, Angus Imrie and was distributed by Warner Bros.. ==Other websites== * Category:2025 movies Category:2020s science fiction movies Category:2020s comedy movies Category:2020s black comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American science fiction movies Category:South Korean movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies about cloning Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies directed by Bong Joon-ho
title: Mickey 17
